$eref.description: A schema, all classifier modules should sattisfy to
$eref.title: Schema for all Classifier Modules

___EmergencyThld.description: Emergency threshold for patterns that is used  for selecting concepts that are used within the classifier
___EmergencyThld.title: Emergency Threshold for Patterns

___ClassesPath.description: Path to file containing the correspondance between objectnames and classes. File should satisfy https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AlekseyBuzmakov/FCAPS/master/FCAPS/schemas/Other/ClassifierClasses.json
___ClassesPath.title: Path to Classes File

___TrainPath.description: Path to file containing a lattice with train concepts. File should satisfy https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AlekseyBuzmakov/FCAPS/master/FCAPS/schemas/lattice.json
___TrainPath.title: Path to File with Train Data

___Type.description: It is a pattern manager module

$eref.description: A schema, all pattern managers modules should sattisfy to
$eref.title: Schema for all Pattern Manager Modules

___PatternManager.description: Pattern manager used to process (intersection, checking subsumption) patterns and objects in the lattice and input objet descriptions
___PatternManager.title: Pattern Manager for Descriptions

description: A schema, for CAEP classifier by Dong
title: CAEP classifier by Dong
